name: PLAN / OUT Workflow Template
description: Packages PLAN PROCESS results into verification-ready artifacts before VERIFY begins.
inputs: job.stage MUST equal PLAN and job.subflow MUST equal OUT.
Lock MUST stay active, job.status MUST be working, job.halted MUST remain FALSE, guards MUST stay TRUE.
PLAN todo tracker MUST be up to date and include ownership + due hints.
Operator MUST confirm whether any new risks surfaced after PROCESS.
steps: Summarize backlog intent, risk deltas, and gating evidence in artifact_path.
Snapshot todo status (open/closed) and link to supporting docs so VERIFY can audit quickly.
Document acceptance evidence for INGEST + PROCESS outputs, citing filenames and timestamps.
List outstanding clarifications that VERIFY MUST close or explicitly accept as risk.
outputs: artifact_path containing PLAN summary, backlog snapshot, and evidence list.
Updated todo_tracker status values reflecting any last-minute adjustments.
acceptance: Artifact MUST state whether each ingress/process objective passed or needs VERIFY attention.
Outstanding todo count MUST be present so VERIFY knows closure effort.
Evidence list MUST cite storage paths accessible from Windows and WSL.
